content: enkle men supre tøfler gode å ha på og enkle å putte i veska med bare rette masker er det et kjempefint prosjekt for nye strikkere skostørrelse 32-34 35-37 38-40 41-43 44-46 strikkefasthet 20 m/10 cm pinneforslag 3 5 mm strømpepinner 4 mm strømpepinner garnforbruk ca 100 115 130 145 160 meter modell 32-34 hillesvåg fjell ubleket hvit 100 38-40 novita 7 brødre pohjola saana 800 tips den erfarne strikker kan legge opp med dobbelt opplegg/judys magic cast on og således slippe å sy sammen hælen til sist --- very easily knitted and great slippers very comfortable and small enough to fit in your purse a great way to use some of that leftover yarn since the only techniques you need to know are garter stitch and knitting in the round this is a great project for beginners i have therefore tried to write an easy pattern on the yarn side i would recommend something woolly for warmth and preferably with a bit of nylon for strength if you have only got pure wool let a string of sewing thread follow your yarn
